dialogues.Text: Mom, dad, I wanted to talk to you about all the murders.
I know what I'm doing is wrong, but at least their bodies will serve a purpose even after their death.
I know, I know. Killing people is bad... Do you really think I don't feel guilty'?
Don't complain so much, it was thanks to them that I learned how to cook.
Look, I know you won't understand me, but I'm sure you'll be grateful down the line.
You taught me family comes first, so I will do anything to keep this family going.
